attributes.action: Fully investigate and have all details made public on the true reasoning behind Tony Blair commiting this country to war in Iraq.This to include all involvement by those around Tony Blair at the time together with a long awaited open account of the death of Dr David Kelly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British people deserve to know why this country was taken to war in Iraq on the dececion of a handfull of people surrounding Tony Blair and without the full voting consent of the British elected parliament.The great people of this country have been held in contempt by this government for far to long.To now be open and honest in this Labour government's dying days about why so many lives have since been lost including those brave and honourable individuals within our armed services may just possibly restore somewhat the faith of those who voted them into office.It would be in the Labour parties interests to deal with this matter now and quickly while they still can otherwise rest assured the next government will and the outcome of their open and completely honest conclusions could damn the Labour party into oblivion.

rejection.details: Your petition overlaps with this existing petition http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/TonyBlairandWMD/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
